Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-05-03T19:57:51
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Susan Bondurant Papers TAM 230
3 Linear Feet 3 boxes
1971-1990 1 2 3
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Provenance unknown; most likely donated by Susan Bondurant. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.190.
Custodial History
Provenance unknown, but we have reason to believe that Susan Bondurant sent a gift of Freedom Socialist Party materials from 1971-1990.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Susan Bondurant was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
